name: Catapult Pizzeria
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 172

You are a pizza deliveryman, but your store is in such a cold place, that if you try to go out and deliver the pizzas, you are going to freeze, so you have the great idea to use a catapult, and it works! 

Use your catapult to deliver pizza to the city people!

Use the arrow keys to move, and use space to shoot your pizzas!

(The graphics in this version are just placeholders!!!)
